item.title: The Murder on the Links
item.description:
Title: The Murder on the Links #

Author: Agatha Christie #

Year: 1923 #

One - A FELLOW TRAVELLER #

I believe that a well-known anecdote exists to the effect that a young writer, determined to make the commencement of his story forcible and original enough to catch and rivet the attention of the most blas√© of editors, penned the following sentence:

“‘Hell!’ said the Duchess.”

Strangely enough, this tale of mine opens in much the same fashion. Only the lady who gave utterance to the exclamation was not a duchess.
